```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Load Data


```{r}
df <- read_tsv("../peaks/tmuris.coverage.partial.clean800.tsv.gz")
head(df)
```

# Poisson Regression


```{r}
m.poisson <- glm(distance ~ batch + gene, data=df, weights=counts, family='poisson')

summary(m.poisson)
plot(m.poisson)
anova(m.poisson)
```


# Gamma Regression

```{r}
m.gamma <- glm(distance ~ batch + gene, data=df, weights=counts, family=Gamma())

summary(m.gamma)
plot(m.gamma)
anova(m.gamma)
```
